===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# seed of the [[Morning glory]], [[w:Ipomoea|Ipomoea]] or [[w:Pharbitis|Pharbitis]]. (a [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to treat asthma, phlegm, cough, flatulence and constipation.)
